name: MBC-4.0 / IGSOA Test Suite Master Index
description: Central registry of all automated test suites (NF-checks, regression suites, coverage packs) for the MBC-4.0 / IGSOA library.
notes: Each entry in \`suites\` points to one or more JSON test-suite files.
Test runners should resolve \`suite\_id\` and then load \`files\[\*\].path\` in dependency order.
NF \= Normal Form; many suites assert NF invariants for δ–Φ–Π and extended families.
